name: Dream Warrior (JC Fuggy)
description:
"If you could be anything... and I mean anything in your dream... What would it be?"

Dream Warrior

All of a sudden, a little kid wakes up in a dark unknown place...

Become a holy knight and slash your way through an army of shadowy creatures as you try to escape this twisted nightmare world! Find all hidden mementos as you slowly uncover the truth of this mystery...

FEATURES:
  • Hollow Knight inspired combat gameplay
  • Three dark levels alongside many enemies and secrets
  • A deep story including fully animated cinematics combined with a beautiful soundtrack throughout the game
REQUIREMENTS:
  • Minimum 1.2 GB available space
  • PC Windows only
  • Keyboard or Xbox controller
CONTROLS: Keyboard:Xbox:
Arrow keysJoystick / D-padMove / Slash directionZAJumpXXAttack / Skip cutsceneSYTantrum AttackCLT / RTDashEnterAConfirmEscStartPause/Close menu

(This game is a student project made in 8 weeks, created by 13 students at The Game Assembly. Credits is shown in the game. No further development will be made.)
